授業目的: このゼミは死生学について基礎的な知識を身に着けることを目的とする。
到達目標: 死生学に関わる基本的な文献、概念、議論などについて知識を得、英語力（読む、聞く、話す）を養うことを目標とする。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: The primary language of instruction and discussion in the seminar will be English. However, we will occasionally allow Japanese discussion to understand difficult topics. In principle, the seminar will be student-led. Students will take turns leading a conversation on the selected reading/topics and raising their own questions. The instructor will help facilitate discussion and occasionally provide short lectures to clarify important points.

トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to do a close reading of the assigned text ("Tuesdays with Morrie"), and come to class prepared to raise questions and make comments. When it is their turn to help lead the discussion, some additional preparation time will be necessary.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: The final grade will be based on attendance, quality of participation, discussion, presentations, and written work.
